message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable item that will bring you a lot of benefits. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. This product would be valuable to me, but I need to stay within a reasonable budget. Would you consider $9,000?
I understand that $14,000 is a bit high for you, but I also need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about $11,500?
Alice, I appreciate you moving a bit on the price.  To make this work for me, I need to keep it closer to $10,000. Would you consider $10,500?

I understand you're trying to get it as close to $10,000 as possible, but I really need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to get to at least $12,000. How about $12,200?
